    # Responsive by percertage

    50
    40
    10
    <ui-row>
 <ui-col :basis="50">
   <div class="box">50</div>
 </ui-col>
 <ui-col :basis="40">
   <div class="box">40</div>
 </ui-col>
 <ui-col :basis="10">
   <div class="box">10</div>
 </ui-col>
</ui-row>

    # Offset

        <ui-row>
      <ui-col :xs-offset="10" :xs="2">
        <div class="box"></div>
      </ui-col>
    </ui-row>
    <ui-row>
      <ui-col :xs-offset="8" :xs="4">
        <div class="box"></div>
      </ui-col>
    </ui-row>
    <ui-row>
      <ui-col :xs-offset="6" :xs="6">
        <div class="box"></div>
      </ui-col>
    </ui-row>

    # space between ÊúÄÂêé‰∏Ä‰∏™itemÂØπÈΩêÊñπÂºè

    Flex-box: Align last row to grid

    .grid {
  display: flex;
  flex-flow: row wrap;
  justify-content: space-between;
}

.grid::after {
  content: "";
  flex: auto;
}

    # Âõ∫ÂÆöÂÆΩÂ∫¶ space between,‰∏çÈÄÇÁî®ui-col

    .list {
  &::after {
    content: "";
    @include lg {
      width: 300px; // itemÂÆΩÂ∫¶
    }

    @include md {
      width: 300px;
    }
  }
  @include xs{
    justify-content: center;
  }
  @include sm{
    justify-content: space-between;
  }
}
